information: The company PERKINS MOTOREN GMBH, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1958, which operates in the Agriculture and forestry - machinery and equipment industry. It also operates in the Gas powered engines, Gardening and horticulture - machinery and equipment, and Livestock raising - machinery and equipment industries. It is based in Kleinostheim, Germany.
